details.point: Lead subteams in design, manufacturing, and programming of team robot and train new members to contribute to robot development.
Maintain and contribute to team's Particle Filter, Holonomic Time Optimized Autonomous Path Planner, Yearly Robot Control Software.
Directing long term project to develop and maintain new, highly modular, competition data collection app Quickscout.
Contribute to and utilize TheBlueAlliance: a comprehensive FRC data insights platform.
12th place Ranked Team Internationally, 4th in California (2024)
